channel.title: Beans, Bread, Books
channel.description: Recent content on Beans, Bread, Books

item.title: Bread bag
item.description: I use a paper bag for my bread to regulate the humidity. Without a bag, it would dry out too quickly, but a plastic bag can trap too much humidity and cause unwanted mold. Before plastic bags displaced them, paper bags were the most popular choice for carrying food from the grocery store.1 https://www.theatlantic.com/science/archive/2022/01/plastic-history-climate-change/621033/ ↩︎

item.title: Leaving Charlottesville
item.description: My train to Chicago (number 51) is running an hour and a half late :(
